sqlquery.name: query.design.Dimension
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ * /*COUNT*/ from ( select C1 as RequestID , C700024201 as DFieldText , C700024202 as DFieldName , C700024203 as DFieldID , C700024210 as FieldBaseType , C700024209 as FieldBaseTypeName , C700024204 as FieldFormText , C700024205 as FieldFormName , C700024206 as FieldText , C700024207 as FieldName , C700024208 as FieldID from {WF:App_WorkFlowDimensions} where 1=1 $searchpara$ )
